Set in 1796, it revolves around Kerala Varma, the king of Pazassi Palace of Kottayam House, and the leader of the revolt against the colonisers. The film won the National Award for Best Background Score, Audiography and the Special Jury Award for Padmapriya. The music of the movie is composed by Ilaiyaraaja and it was dubbed and released in Tamil and Hindi after its stupendous success at the box office. Watch the full film, streaming online on Hotstar.
